articles.description: The first annual Umpqua Valley Food Rally collected 2,176 pounds of food and raised $2,128 to support families across Douglas County. Planned in just three weeks, the event drew strong community turnout and organizers say it will now become an annual tradition.

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Funding cuts by NOAA have halted real-time seismic data from the Alaska Earthquake Center, raising concerns about reduced accuracy in tsunami forecasting. Emergency officials warn that the loss of nearby sensors increases uncertainty and could impact coastal evacuation decisions.
articles.title: NOAA Cuts Funding for Alaska Seismic Monitoring, Raising Concerns Over Tsunami Readiness

articles.description: Roseburg’s new EBRC Raceway has opened on Diamond Lake Blvd, offering a two-level indoor RC racing facility with a 1/10th-scale off-road track, pit area, and pro shop. Partnering with The Roseburg Plug, the track aims to build community and bring year-round fun to local RC enthusiasts.
articles.title: EBRC Raceway Brings High-Energy RC Racing to Roseburg
